title: I Married My Best Friend to Shut My Parents up
title_alt: Aku Menikahi Sahabatku untuk Membungkam Orangtuaku - Oya ga Urusai node Kouhai to Gisou Kekkon shitemita - 親がうるさいので後輩（♀）と偽装結婚してみた。 - Anaerobic Love - I Married My Best Friend to Shut My Parents up - I Decided to Fake a Marriage with My Junior to Shut My Parents up - 無酸素恋愛 - Oya ga Urusai no de Kouhai (♀) to Gisou Kekkon Shitemita - I Married a Girl to Shut My Parents up - 부모님이 시끄러워서 후배(♀)와 위장결혼을 해봤다 - 父母的不停催促让我不得已选择了和后辈假装结婚 - Musanso Ren’ai - I Decided to Fake a Marriage with My Junior (♀) to Shut My Parents up - Musanso Renai - Me casei com uma colega para calar os meus pais - मैले मेरो आमा बुबालाई चुपचाप बनाउन मेरो सबैभन्दा राम्रो साथी संग बिहे गरें - รำคาญนักก็แต่งงานกันซะเลย - I Camouflage Marriage with a Junior (♀️) Because My Parent is Very Noisy - I Married a Girl to Shut my Parents Up (Italy) - Oya ga Urusai no de Kouhai to Gisou Kekkon shite mita. - Oya ga Urusai node Kouhai (♀) to Gisou Kekkon Shitemita - Oya ga Urusai node Kouhai (♀) to Gisou Kekkon Shitemita. -
author: Kodama Naoko
description:
Morimoto is getting bugged by her parents to marry (a guy). Her (female) kouhai suggests she fake her marriage so her parents would stop but they will scrutinize every guy she might choose no matter what. Since there's a new law that allows homosexuals to marry, her kouhai suggests herself; only this kouhai has confessed to her before. What will become of their married life?

Incluedes additional oneshot: Anaerobic Love
Your back is always facing me. I'm watching you way up close.
